name: Mambo Hill Hotel and Resort Nusa Penida | Boutique Hotel in Nusa Penida
address: Banjar Adegan, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: This place has an amazing view right from your bed! Open the doors to your private balcony and enjoy the ocean view from the pool. The room is very nice and has an authentic look and feel. Its uphill but they provide a free shuttle to get down to the main street. We‚Äôve also rented a scooter here and it was also in very good condition. Way better than we had so far during our trip. Roads are small and sometimes a bit rough so thats important. However if you‚Äôre not an experienced scooter driver, its better to do a day tour with a private driver which you can also book via reception.
review 2:
So we stayed for 4 days in the Mambo Hill Resort and it was a blast. We really enjoyed the Rooms at the poolside, accessing the pool out of your own room is amazing. The view is also absolutely astonishing, you look just above the jungle to the see. Simply Beautiful.

Not to mention that the food was very delicious!
They also have a special shuttle service to the other Hotel called Mambo Beach Resort which is obviously at the beach and has a beautiful ambiente at the evening.

We enjoyed the stay and would definitely recommend the Hotel!!

Thanks tot he Mambo Team
review 3: Had a great week here at the hill resort, and will definitely stay here again if I ever come to Nusa Penida again. Very convenient transport between the hill and beach resort, and pickup at the harbor. Staffs are really nice and friendly. View from the room is amazing, breakfast is simple but tasty (love the pancakes). Only downside is that you can here the sound from the other rooms sometimes can be noisy but they provided earplugs for this
review 4:
I recently stayed at Mambo Hill Hotel and Resort Nusa penida for a getaway and was thoroughly impressed by the experience. From the moment I arrived, the service was exceptional. The staff greeted me warmly and ensured a smooth check-in process. My room was spacious, impeccably clean, and tastefully decorated, offering a panoramic view of the sea shore .

The amenities are top-notch. The on-site restaurant served a diverse menu with delicious options for all meals. I particularly enjoyed the breakfast buffet, which featured fresh, local ingredients and a variety of choices to suit different dietary preferences.

One of the highlights of my stay was the  pool. It provided a relaxing escape with stunning views, comfortable lounge chairs, and prompt poolside service.

Overall, my stay was memorable. The combination of excellent service, luxurious accommodations, and prime location makes it a perfect choice for anyone visiting the city. I highly recommend this hotel and look forward to my next visit.
review 5: It‚Äôs a big WOW. Excellent environment, welcomed with lush green lobby and friendly staffs. The hotel design is super pretty, full of Balinese craft works and it has direct access to the pool! ü§© The room has perfect view toward Mt. Agung, sunrise and sunset. And they have butler service to mambo beach resorts too. Kudos to Mambo! Would love to be back here again.

name: Sanctum Hotel and Dive - Nusa Penida
address: Jl. Jungutbatu, Biaung, Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
types: hotel, hostel, lodging, sporting_goods_store, sports_club, store
review 1:
I booked my diving course and stay with sanctum. The room was a nice surprise for the price. Spacious and have everything you need if you are not fussy about the details. It‚Äôs a little far from the centre but they will give u a ride via scooter if u don‚Äôt have one!

The diving centre was amazing, everyone was so sweet and welcoming!! I had the best three days with everyone and honestly couldn‚Äôt bear to leave as i fell in love with the place and people. I will be back for sure üôèüèª
review 2:
This hotel was a very nice discovery. Surrounded by beautiful vegetation, quiet, I loved this place.

The service is impeccable. The rooms are very spacious with plenty of room for business storage.
I can only recommend this hotel to future visitors of Nusa Penida.

Florence
review 3:
Heyyoo! I‚Äôm sad to post this review despite all of the positive feedbacks here. I like the style of the rooms and closeness to the seaside as well as the idea that I would spend time in a nice place with the sauna, but it turned out that pictures differs from the reality.
For a few days to see Nusa Penida it‚Äôs okay but in fact it is a moldy place with a lot of insects inside. In our room it was a very poor lighting in the toilet and after the sunset we were taking shower almost in a dark.
We tried sauna and I think it‚Äôs broken because every time we entered we got a slight electricity shotüôàü•≤
I‚Äôd like to know that this will be helpful next time for the other guests and I‚Äôll be glad to help owners to fix everything because I think (especially with the sauna) it‚Äôs ridiculous to leave it like it is!
review 4: The room is spacious, comfortable, & clean. The staff is also very helpful & friendly. The bathroom, however, is kinda dark daytime as it uses black ceramics. And as we unfortunately come in rainy season, there are many small caterpillars in the area, but if it‚Äôs sunny, there won‚Äôt be any caterpillars being said.
review 5: I really love this little gem up the hill. Away from the crowed, surrounded by trees. The rooms are big, clean and are made in a minimalistic modern style. You can have a hot shower or dipping into the pool. Even a Sauna can this place offer. There is plenty of space for cars or motorcycles. A little open lounge place whit a kitchen invites for dinner with friends. Ketut, a staff member, is welcoming you with his warm and gentle persona. Here I feel taken care, I can relax or work. I found a home away from home.

name: Mambo Hill Restaurant & Cafe Nusa Penida
address: Banjar Adegan, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Incredible! Food amazing, juices and drink so nice, the best staff ever! Everyone so kind! Everyone need to come here once at list. It‚Äôs a piece of paradise ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
review 2: A great stay - and food was incredible. The  only thing even better was the view! Will be trying a cocktail tonight for sure. Very welcoming and attentive staff.
review 3:
Amazing view ! Set up is really cosy. Cocktails are great, very enjoyable with a beach and mountains view, legs in the pool ! Staff is lovely !!
A bit away but that is perfect if you‚Äôre looking for quiet and calm !
Recommended ! Will comeback when back to Nusa Penida !
review 4:
Nice place to stay and have dinner and drinks!
Enjoyed their classic cocktails, that rarely happens in Asia. Highly recommend!
Also tried burgers, mambo and double cheeseburger, both were nice
review 5: the food is so delicious! with very beautiful views, it is very comfortable to enjoy time here

name: Stone Hills Bungalow
address: Br. Adegan kangin, desa, 8G73+G6V, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Hands down the best HOST in Indonesia! The owner treated me as part of his family! drove everywhere for food, took me to medical center after I got super sick from snorkeling trip. I was feeling so helpless since I went by myself. I had to extended one more night because my headache was killing me. He told me,‚ÄùDon‚Äôt worry! It‚Äôs okay to stay one more night. I will give you discount. As long as you stay here, you are our family‚Äù omg!!! How sweet is that! I‚Äôve stayed in canggu for three weeks and no one treated me the way this owner/host treats his guests! This morning he even took me with his scooter to the famous beach. It takes 1hr one way and usually charges 200K for a guided tour but he told me it‚Äôs free! He even paid for my painkiller medicine fee in the medical center! üß° Trust me! This is the best homestay experience I‚Äôve ever have! The room and shower room is super spacious! Clean and quite. With free breakfast included üëçüèΩ Super highly recommend üòÉüòÉüòÉ
review 2: Look no further. Excellent quality room woth a good bed and shower for a correct price on a great location. View on Gunung Agung.
review 3: The room are very nice! But the garden not so nice, maybe it's because it's new.
review 4: Nice place,  by sea vew and very quite place. This very good for relaxing
review 5: A comfortable and nice place to stay. Recommended.

name: RELAXSOUL CUBANG ABANG HOME VACATION & VILLA
address: Ped, Jalan Raya Toya Pakeh, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Located in a beautiful place, the place is a value for money place. Quite cheap and you get exactly what you paid for. They conveniently have 2 wheelers you could rent however, the bikes are not really in the best condition and my advice is not to take the bikes on long rides to the south of the island. There is a nice restaurant nearby where you could have food where you could check out possibilities of diving as well.
review 2: It's very quit place and we will fell it in our house

name: Taman Anugrah
address: 8G94+J6H, Br. Biaung, Ped, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
